entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 25. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
